inkface.evas – Evas Backend¶

Module Contents¶

class inkface.evas.EFace(svgname, canvas=None)¶

Evas Face object.

Parameters:
  • svgname – Path of the SVG file to load
  • canvas – Optional argument. If it is not passed, the elements won’t be loaded. In that case call load_elements() with the canvas argument. This is because of the nature of Evas canvas. Since it keeps the state of all elements drawn on it, they have to be created from it, so that it knows about them.
clone(curNodeName, newNodeName, new_x=-1, new_y=-1)¶

Clones an existing element of the face to create a duplicate one.

Parameters:
  • curNodeName – name of existing element to be cloned
  • newNodeName – name the new element should have
  • new_x – [optional] x coord of new element
  • new_y – [optional] y coord of new element
load_elements(canvas)¶

Loads elements of this face.

Parameter:canvas – Canvas to create elements from.
class inkface.evas.ECanvas((width, height)=(640, 480), caption='Evas Inkface App', framerate=0)¶

Evas Canvas object.

Parameters:
  • (width, height) – dimensions of canvas
  • caption – Title of window
  • framerate – Animation framerate (in fps)
add(face)¶
This is a no-op so far for Evas Canvas.
eventloop()¶
It calls ecore.main_loop_begin. If framerate is >0, then it sets the animator_frametime.
remove(face)¶
Remove all elements of the face from canvas :param face: Face of whose elements are to be removed from canvas.
stop()¶
Call to cleanup the canvas when exiting.
class inkface.evas.ECanvasElement(svgelem, canvas)¶

Evas CanvasElement object.

Parameters:
  • svgelem – inkface.altsvg.element.Element object
  • canvas – Canvas to create this element from.
dup(newName)¶
Create duplicate copy of this element.
hide()¶
Hide this element
refresh(svg_reload=True, imgpath=None)¶

Refresh the element.

Parameters:
  • svg_reload – re-render the SVG underlying element (default - True)
  • imgpath – Instead of rendering the SVG element, load an image and render it on this element. It is useful in scenarios, where the SVG element is used only to get the location. Its content are dynamically filled by the app at run time.
set_position((x, y))¶
Parameter:(x,y) – x,y coordinates to set this element’s position to
unhide()¶
Unhide this element.
